case.title: Looking for a good woman - 29 (stamford, ct)
case.text: I'm just here looking for a woman to hang out with and maybe a little more. I work hard and try to find time to have fun and meet new people in my free time. We can trade pic for pic if you have some to send. Just a little more about myself, I'm tall (6'4) average built. American American, i like sports, music, the usual. For serious ladies put "Sup" in the subject line so I know that you are real.
